name: Professors
title: Where's My Prof?
description: Locate your professors on campus hassle-free. Say goodbye to wandering through hallways or frantically searching for room numbers.

name: Labs
title: Where's My Lab?
description: Finding your designated lab spaces with ease. No more wandering around campus, feeling lost and bewildered.

name: Amenities
title: Where's My Amenity?
description: Find every amenity on campus, from Academic Blocks to Cafeterias, all in one place.

name: GPA Calculator (Beta)
title: What's My GPA?
description: Estimate your academic growth with ease. No more manual calculations. (Not tested yet. Might not work as expected)

name: Student Council
title: Who's in Student Council?
description: Know your student council members and their roles.
